item.title: Monitor Stand
item.description: Even if you like your desk, more space when keyboard isn’t in use feels nice.

item.title: Plywood Connectors Revisited
item.description: So much has changed in cadquery since I last used it in around 2022. Now We have the sketch API and assembly support.

item.title: Direct Stiffness Method in Python: Trusses and Frames
item.description: This post is about some finite element method code that I wrote back in 2014. I am sharing it here, even though I never finished the data visualization part I wanted back then.

item.title: ASTM D638 Tensile Test Specimens
item.description: No need to say much about the classical ASTM D638 tensile test specimens AKA dogbones. Just a few remarks:

item.title: Cadquery Chess Set
item.description: A weird project to test my new 3d printer: A chess set designed in cadquery.
